DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Research Lung Cancer Patients With Cancer Related Fatigue（CRF）
DOC.criteria: Patients pathologically/cytologically diagnose NSCLC receive radiotherapy without chemotherapy , last radio chemotherapy must least 30 day prior initiation experimental treatment ; Participants meet diagnosis criterion CRF（ICD10 criterion ) ; The first time receive acupuncture treatment ; The age 18 65 year old ; Mean baseline fatigue measure Brief Fatigue Inventory ( BFI ) must four ; ECOG performance status 0 , 1 2 . Patients must adequate organ function reflect laboratory criterion : neutrophil count ≥ 1.5×109 /L , platelet count ≥ 100 x 109/L , hemoglobin ≥ 85 g/L , Serum creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL , Bilirubin < 1.5 mg/dL , ALT < 3 x normal , albumin > 30g/L . Have take hypnotic , melatonin , antidepressant within 30 day ; Willing finish whole observation period ; With write consent form sign . Participants clinical research ; Can pathologically cytologically diagnosed NSCLC ; ECOG 3~4 ; Pregnant woman ; > 65 < 18 year old ; Patients evidence cognitive dysfunction would limit ability report fatigue ; Patients receive acupuncture ever ; Received surgery , immunotherapy target therapy within one month recruition； Taking warfarin heparin , bleed tendency exists ; Infection , ulceration hyperalgesia near local acupoints ' skin，or active infections； There cerebral vascular accident history spinal cord injury history； Combination serious disease condition , include congestive heart failure , Unstable angina pectoris , myocardial infarction past six month , serious 's arrhythmia , mental disorder , drug abuse , etc . ; Patients life expectancy < 3 month ; Patients past history therapy schedule visit noncompliance , determine treat physician .
